channel.title: 3 questions! :)
channel.description:
i am making a server now. not so good with clients so i came here ... im asking a few questions hoping to be answered
1. how to change the background of the client?
2. how automatically i put my ip into other clients?
3. how to reupload the client so it all saves for a person/customer

item.title: 3 questions! :)
item.dc:creator: @UniversalPk UniversalPk
item.description:
@UniversalPk wrote:

question 1;

it will be in “sprites” right click & edit it on paint.

question 2;

I think its “Gui” file or “sub applet 1” take a look.

Read full topic
